Jason Evans' instance generator for three processor scheduling is available via ftp. Solutions to homework one are available now. (Req'd) Computers and Intractability , Garey and Johnson. Freeman, 1979. Programming Project In this course, we implement three programs for the three processor scheduling problem. One uses a simple exhaustive search, another uses backtracking, and the third uses branch and bound.
